lines.text:
[when his wife complains about his habit of entering and tossing the evening newspaper on the dining room table]
It's clean, I had it boiled.
Uh, yeah, um, I'm going out tonight.
Please, darling, don't shed dirt in the living room.
Hello, Julia? This is Alan's brother, Buddy. Hey uh - don't you know you could get arrested for having such a sexy voice?
